Template Name: Consumption Ratable without VC upon booking
Description: Consumption Ratable without VC upon booking
Recognition Notes: WATERFALL: Stand-ready obligation with straightline daily rev rec. Spread allocated amount evenly from Rev Start to Rev End using daily proration. Revenue starts at booking regardless of consumption. This is NOT event-driven. Event Name = 'Upon Booking'.

Template Name: Consumption Ratable with VC upon booking
Description: Consumption Ratable with VC upon booking
Recognition Notes: WATERFALL: Stand-ready obligation with straightline daily rev rec and VC enabled. Same as BK-OT-CONSUMP-RATABLE but with variable consideration and Rip/Replace functionality. Spread constrained estimate ratably, adjust when VC resolves. Event Name = 'Upon Booking'.

WATERFALL: Standard straightline daily rev rec. Spread allocated amount evenly from Rev Start to Rev End. Daily rate = Allocated / Total Days, sum days per month. Event Name = 'Upon Booking'. Most common template for SaaS subscriptions.
WATERFALL: Straightline partial monthly rev rec. First and last months prorated based on actual days. Middle months get equal monthly amounts. Event Name = 'Upon Booking'.
WATERFALL: Recognize 100% in the CURRENT OPEN PERIOD (booking month). Only ONE row with full amount. Event Name = 'Upon Booking'. Period = booking month.
WATERFALL: Recognize 100% in the month of Rev Start Date. Only ONE row with full amount. Event Name = 'Upon Booking'. Period = month containing Revenue Start Date.

WATERFALL: Billing-based release, then straightline partial monthly rev rec. No recognition before billing. After billing, spread through period end with partial month proration. Event Name = 'Upon Billing'.
WATERFALL: Billing-based release, then straightline daily rev rec. No recognition before billing. After billing, spread through period end using daily method. Event Name = 'Upon Billing'.

WATERFALL: Event-driven usage recognition. Revenue recognized upon billing events. Each billing = one row with billed amount in that month. Event Name = 'Upon Billing'. Typically used for standalone usage charges (not prepaid). If no billing data, show $0 for all periods and add open question.
WATERFALL: Recognize 100% in current open period when billed. No revenue before billing. One row per billing with full amount. Event Name = 'Upon Billing'.
WATERFALL: Recognize 100% in the month of service start date, but only after billing. No revenue before billing. Event Name = 'Upon Billing'.
WATERFALL: Event-triggered, then straightline daily rev rec. No revenue until acceptance event. After acceptance, spread ratably through Rev End. Event Name = 'Acceptance'.
WATERFALL: Event-triggered, then straightline daily rev rec. No revenue until go-live event. After go-live, spread ratably through Rev End. Event Name = 'Go-Live Event'.

WATERFALL: Recognize 100% in the month of customer acceptance. Only ONE row with full allocated amount. No revenue before acceptance. Event Name = 'Acceptance'. Use for implementation/PS delivered upon sign-off.
WATERFALL: Release by amount event. Each event = one row with that amount in that month. Event Name = 'BY_AMOUNT'. If no events provided, Amount = 0 for all periods and add open question.

WATERFALL: Recognize 100% in the month of completion event. Only ONE row with full allocated amount. No revenue before completion. Event Name = 'Completion'. Use for milestone-based PS or deliverables.

WATERFALL: Usage recognition by delivery event. Revenue recognized ONLY when delivery events occur. Amount = (units delivered × unit rate). Event Name = 'Upon Consumption'. If no delivery data, show $0 for all periods and add open question asking for delivery schedule.

WATERFALL: Event-driven usage recognition - allows unbilled usage PRIOR to billing. Revenue recognized ONLY when consumption events occur. Amount = (units consumed × unit rate). Event Name = 'Upon Consumption'. Typically used for standalone usage charges (not prepaid). If no usage data, show $0 for all periods and add open question.

WATERFALL: Event-driven usage recognition - allows unbilled usage PRIOR to billing. Revenue recognized ONLY when consumption events occur. DO NOT spread ratably - this is event-driven. Amount = (units consumed × unit rate from prepaid pool). Event Name = 'Upon Consumption'. Typically used for prepaid charges on PPDD or minimum commits. CRITICAL: If no usage data provided, show $0 for ALL periods and add open question asking for usage/consumption data.

WATERFALL: Release by cumulative percentage. Each event = Amount based on incremental % × allocated price. Event Name = 'CUM_PCT_EVNT'. Sum of all % should reach 100% by project end. If no % data, show $0 and add open question.
WATERFALL: Release by hours logged. Each month's Amount = (hours logged × hourly rate). Event Name = 'Hour Input'. If no hours data, show $0 for all periods and add open question.

WATERFALL: Release by percentage-of-completion. Each event = Amount based on POC % × allocated price. Event Name = 'POC'. Incremental recognition as milestones hit. If no POC data, show $0 and add open question.
WATERFALL: Release by quantity event. Each event = Amount based on qty × unit rate. Event Name = 'BY_QTY'. If no qty data, show $0 and add open question.

WATERFALL: Release by usage quantity event (called usage, but release by qty event). Each month's Amount = (usage qty × unit rate). Event Name = 'USAGE_QTY'. If no usage data, show $0 for all periods and add open question.
